document_data.name: ''Captain Herab's Leather Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Captain Herab's leather armor''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[light armor]] worn by Captain [[Herab]] who sailed the [[Sea of Swords]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: This lest of [[leather armor]] was masterfully crafted and reinforced with lightweight metal plates and ensorcelled to provide extra defense without a loss of flexibility.
document_data.History: Captain Herab wore this set of magic armor during her tenure working for the [[Black Network]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, transporting smuggled weapons and supplies of an [[orc]]ish army that menaced the city of [[Daggerford]]. She was adorned in the armor when faced with the [[Hero of Daggerford]] and his allies in the pirate hideout of the [[Crab's Claw Coast]]. With her life likely being forfeit, the fate of ''Captain Herab's leather armor'' was unknown after that point.
